```{r echo=FALSE}
grades <- read.csv("/Users/Tal/Desktop/c101/static/data/grades_1_3.csv")
morning <- subset(grades, section==2)
afternoon <- subset(grades,section == 1)
```

# Grades distribution of the first assignment: Media Journal


```{r, echo=FALSE}
hist(morning$media_journal,
     breaks = 30,
     ylim = c(0,10),
     main = "Friday Morning",
     xlab = "Grades",
     ylab = "Number of People",
     col="orange",
     border="blue",
     labels = TRUE
     )
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
hist(afternoon$media_journal,
     breaks = 30,
     ylim = c(0,15),
     main = "Friday Afternoon",
     xlab = "Grades",
     ylab = "Number of People",
     col="red",
     border="black",
     labels = TRUE
     )
```
